{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07730v1", "title": "Thermodynamics of Reissner-nordstorm black bounce black hole", "summary": "Our study focuses on the thermodynamics of Reissner-nordstorm black bounce
black hole,we have determined the thermodynamic parameters including entropy,
mass, temperature, heat capacity and free energies and investigated how those
parameters are related to entropy and for some insights we additionally focused
on the P V isotherm and the logarithmic correction to the entropy.", "main_category": "gr-qc", "categories": "gr-qc", "published": "2025-04-10T13:27:49Z"}
